skills.name: Wrathful Roar
skills.desc: Gains 3 stacks of Gusto and marks a random target for Monitoring. Until Gusto is exhausted, any target that uses their Skill will become the new Monitored target.

skills.name: Simian Strike
skills.desc: Consumes 1 stack of Gusto and deals Quantum DMG to a Monitored target.

skills.name: Fiery Majesty
skills.desc: Increases DMG dealt. This DMG boosting effect is stackable.
